org.sampleapp.services

Class RestAPIWriteServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sampleapp.services.RestAPIWriteServices

  • public class RestAPIWriteServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class facilitates all the write functionalities to the REST Endpoint such as creating, updating, deleting user objects, adding an user to a group/role, deleting an user from a group/role.
    Author:
    Microsoft Corp

      • updateLink

        public static java.lang.String updateLink(java.lang.String userId,
                          java.lang.String objectName,
                          java.lang.String opName,
                          java.lang.String groupId)
                                   throws SampleAppException
        This method adds or removes a role or group to a particular user depending on the parameters.
        Parameters:
        userId - The Id of the user who should be added to the group/role.
        objectName - Is it Group or Role?
        opName - Whether delete or add
        objectId - The object Id of the Group or the Role.
        Throws:
        SampleAppException
